name: PictureMate Borders File
summary: Learn about .FD2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: FD2 files may be referenced by Epson's PictureMate Deluxe Viewer program or the newer Epson EasyPrint software.

description: Contains photo borders used by Epson PictureMate printers; includes information such as the template name, image resolution, print size, aspect ratio, color space, bind margin, and other formatting data.
